sections.heading: Oaths, Depositions, Acknowledgments; Powers of Legislators.
sections.text:
During his term of office, every senator and representative in the state legislature is hereby authorized, by virtue of his office to administer oaths, take depositions and acknowledgments.

History:1901, Act 127, Eff. Sept. 5, 1901 ;-- CL 1915, 52 ;-- CL 1929, 19 ;-- CL 1948, 4.121
